data.title: Biography of Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1798-1869
meta_keywords: Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1798-1869
data.meta_description: Biography of Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1798-1869 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
In 1786 [his father] Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 (age 20) and [his mother] Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 14) were married. She the daughter of Christian VII King Denmark and Norway 1749-1808 (age 36) and Caroline Matilda Hanover Queen Consort Denmark and Norway. He the son of Frederick Christian Oldenburg I Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1721-1794 (age 64) and Charlotte Amalie Wilhelmine Unknown Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. She a great granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 13 Nov 1794 [his grandfather] Frederick Christian Oldenburg I Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1721-1794 (age 73) died. His son [his father] Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 (age 29) succeeded Christian II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. [his mother] Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 23) by marriage Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg.

On 19 Jul 1798 Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg was born to Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 (age 32) and Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 27) at Copenhagen. He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 14 Jun 1814 [his father] Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 (age 48) died at Augustenborg, Als Island. His son Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 15) succeeded Aug II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg.

In 1820 Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 21) and Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg were married. She by marriage Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. He the son of Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 and Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 48). He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 20 Jul 1821 [his son] Alexander Frederick Oldenburg was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 23) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 03 May 1823 [his son] Alexander Frederick Oldenburg (age 1) died.

On 28 Aug 1823 [his daughter] Louise Auguste Oldenburg was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 25) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 15 Jan 1826 [his daughter] Caroline Amelie Oldenburg was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 27) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 24 Mar 1828 [his daughter] Wilhelmine Oldenburg was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 29) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 04 Jul 1829 [his daughter] Wilhelmine Oldenburg (age 1) died.

On 06 Jul 1829 [his son] Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1829-1880 was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 30) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 22 Jan 1831 [his son] Prince Frederick Christian Oldenburg was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 32) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg at Augustenborg, Als Island. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 02 Aug 1833 [his son] Caroline Christiane Oldenburg was born to Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 35) and [his wife] Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 13 Jan 1843 [his mother] Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 71) died.

On 11 Sep 1856 [his son] Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1829-1880 (age 27) and [his daughter-in-law] Adelheid Hohenlohe Langenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg were married. She by marriage Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. He the son of Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1798-1869 (age 58) and Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

Before 14 Apr 1867 [his son] Prince Frederick Christian Oldenburg (age 36) and [his daughter-in-law] Helena Windsor (age 20) were married. She the daughter of Prince Albert Saxe Coburg Gotha and Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom (age 47). He the son of Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1798-1869 (age 68) and Louise Sophie Danneskiold Samsøe Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg. They were third cousins. He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 11 Mar 1869 Christian August Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 70) died. His son [his son] Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1829-1880 (age 39) succeeded II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg.
